title: How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2
summary:
This article details the investigation of a bug in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that surfaced in Windows 11 24H2, causing the Skimmer seaplane to disappear from the game or send the player flying into the sky. The author, the creator of SilentPatch (a mod that fixes bugs in the game), initially dismissed the reports but confirmed the issue on a Windows 11 24H2 virtual machine.

The investigation revealed that the bug stemmed from an uninitialized wheel scale value in the game's data file (vehicles.ide) for the Skimmer. Due to an oversight, the Skimmer's definition was missing wheel scale parameters, causing the game to read garbage values from the stack, which, until Windows 11 24H2, coincidentally led to usable but incorrect gameplay.

The root cause traced back to how the game loaded vehicle data. The function CFileLoader::LoadVehicleObject used sscanf to parse the vehicles.ide file, and assumed all parameters are always present. Since Skimmer's entry omitted the wheel scale values, the related variables remained uninitialized, and garbage data would be read in their place. Prior to Windows 11 24H2, the default values produced by uninitialized data resulted in (incorrect) stable gameplay, while the update now produces numbers that cause out-of-bounds physics calculations and crashes.

The author provides a fix for SilentPatch, which involves providing default values for the missing wheel scale parameters during the file loading process, and explains how the game erroneously used the prior wheel scale values defined on the car above it, but that this behavior was still coincidently stable until Windows 11 24H2. The article concludes by highlighting the unusual nature of the bug, questioning why it remained hidden for so long before being triggered by a specific Windows update.

title: How ZGC allocates memory for the Java heap
summary:
This article provides a deep dive into how ZGC, a garbage collector in OpenJDK, allocates memory for the Java heap. The heap is divided into logical regions called pages, categorized as Small (2MB), Medium (32MB), and Large (dynamically sized, over 4MB). The Page Allocator manages these pages, maintaining partitions representing subsets of the heap. NUMA systems can have multiple partitions, each corresponding to a NUMA node for improved memory access speed.

ZGC uniquely separates physical and virtual memory to combat fragmentation. Virtual memory is over-reserved (up to 16x or 32x the maximum heap size) to increase the likelihood of finding contiguous memory ranges. When pages are freed, ZGC actively defragments the heap by re-mapping physical memory to new virtual addresses.

The Mapped Cache stores ranges of mapped memory that are not in use by any page, using a self-balancing binary search tree for efficient management. It uses intrusive storage to avoid dynamic memory allocation and speeds up searches for contiguous memory during allocations.

Memory allocation involves claiming capacity, securing physical memory, and potentially using virtual memory from the Mapped Cache. The allocation process prioritizes obtaining contiguous memory from the cache, followed by increasing capacity (committing new memory), and finally harvesting smaller ranges from the cache if necessary. If capacity can't be increased, the allocation will prioritize harvesting existing mapped memory that is available.

本文深入探讨了OpenJDK中垃圾收集器ZGC如何为Java堆分配内存。堆被划分为称为页面的逻辑区域，分为小型（2MB）、中型（32MB）和大型（动态大小，超过4MB）三类。页面分配器管理这些页面，维护代表堆子集的多个分区。NUMA系统可以有多个分区，每个分区对应一个NUMA节点，以提高内存访问速度。

ZGC独特地分离了物理内存和虚拟内存，以对抗碎片化。虚拟内存被过度预留（最高可达最大堆大小的16倍或32倍），以增加找到连续内存范围的可能性。当页面被释放时，ZGC通过将物理内存重新映射到新的虚拟地址来主动整理堆。

映射缓存存储了未被任何页面使用的已映射内存范围，使用自平衡二叉搜索树进行高效管理。它使用侵入式存储来避免动态内存分配，并加快分配期间搜索连续内存的速度。

内存分配涉及声明容量、获取物理内存，并可能使用来自映射缓存的虚拟内存。分配过程优先从缓存中获取连续内存，然后增加容量（提交新内存），最后在必要时从缓存中收集较小的范围。如果无法增加容量，分配将优先收集可用的现有映射内存。

title: How MOS 6502 Illegal Opcodes Work (2008)
summary:
This article explains how illegal opcodes on the MOS 6502 processor work by examining the processor's internal architecture and instruction decoding process. Unlike CPUs using microcode, the 6502 uses a 130x21 bit PLA (Programmable Logic Array) to interpret instructions. Each line in the PLA compares the opcode and the current clock cycle (T1-T6), firing if they match and triggering specific CPU actions.

The opcodes are structured to allow generalization of behavior, meaning certain PLA lines can fire for multiple similar opcodes, executing a shared task like fetching an address byte. Illegal opcodes arise because these undefined instructions can still trigger existing PLA lines designed for valid instructions.

The article uses the example of opcode $AF (LAX absolute) to illustrate this. $AF doesn't have dedicated PLA lines, but its bitfield triggers lines intended for $AD (LDA abs) and $AE (LDX abs) during specific cycles (T1, T2, T4). In cycle T3, it triggers *both* LDA and LDX lines, causing the processor to load the fetched value into both the accumulator (A) and the X register simultaneously, effectively creating the "LAX" instruction.

The article also explains the "KIL" (halt) opcodes. These occur when no valid instruction line fires across all clock cycles (T1-T7), preventing the T bitfield from resetting. This halts the CPU and disables interrupts because interrupt requests are delayed until instruction completion (T reset), which never happens. Therefore, understanding how illegal opcodes interact with the 6502's PLA can reveal insights into the CPU's internal design and potentially uncover other undocumented behaviors.
chinese_title: MOS 6502非法操作码的工作原理 (2008)
chinese_summary:
本文通过研究MOS 6502处理器的内部架构和指令解码过程，解释了该处理器上非法操作码的工作原理。与使用微代码的CPU不同，6502使用一个130x21位的PLA（可编程逻辑阵列）来解释指令。PLA中的每一行都比较操作码和当前时钟周期（T1-T6），如果它们匹配，则触发并启动特定的CPU动作。

操作码的结构允许行为的泛化，这意味着某些PLA行可以为多个相似的操作码触发，执行诸如获取地址字节之类的共享任务。非法操作码的出现是因为这些未定义的指令仍然可以触发为有效指令设计的现有PLA行。

本文以操作码$AF（LAX绝对寻址）为例来说明这一点。$AF没有专用的PLA行，但它的位域在特定周期（T1、T2、T4）触发为$AD（LDA绝对寻址）和$AE（LDX绝对寻址）设计的行。在周期T3中，它会*同时*触发LDA和LDX行，导致处理器将获取的值同时加载到累加器（A）和X寄存器中，从而有效地创建“LAX”指令。

本文还解释了“KIL”（停止）操作码。当所有时钟周期（T1-T7）中都没有有效的指令行触发时，就会发生这种情况，从而阻止T位域复位。这会停止CPU并禁用中断，因为中断请求会被延迟到指令完成（T复位）为止，而这种情况永远不会发生。因此，了解非法操作码如何与6502的PLA交互可以揭示对CPU内部设计的见解，并可能发现其他未记录的行为。

title: Beer on Board in the Age of Sail (2017)
summary:
Julia Blakely's "Beer on Board in the Age of Sail" explores the historical significance of beer as a staple beverage for seafarers, particularly in the Age of Sail. The article traces the origins of beer brewing back to ancient civilizations and highlights its importance on ships, where it provided nutrition, calories, and a safer alternative to potentially contaminated water.

The article details the rations provided to sailors, referencing the British Royal Navy's records and figures like Samuel Pepys. It emphasizes that the beer consumed was often "small beer," low in alcohol content. The piece also explores the role of beer in preventing scurvy, citing James Cook's voyages and the use of spruce beer, a practice adopted from Native Americans, as a source of vitamin C.

The shift from beer to rum in certain regions, the prohibition of alcohol in the US Navy, and the historical context of beer production in early America are discussed. The article highlights Louis Pasteur's contributions to beer preservation through pasteurization. Finally, the author touches upon the maritime origins of some common English phrases and encourages readers to explore the Smithsonian Libraries' collections to further investigate the intertwined histories of beer and the sea.

文章讨论了某些地区从啤酒到朗姆酒的转变、美国海军对酒精的禁令以及早期美国啤酒生产的历史背景。 文章重点介绍了路易斯·巴斯德通过巴氏消毒法对啤酒保鲜的贡献。 最后，作者谈到了某些常见英语短语的航海起源，并鼓励读者探索史密森尼学会图书馆的藏品，以进一步调查啤酒和海洋相互交织的历史。

title: Show HN: Moose – OSS framework to build analytical back ends with ClickHouse
summary:
Moose is an open-source framework designed to simplify the creation of analytical backends using ClickHouse. It allows developers to define data models in TypeScript or Python, automatically generating the necessary data ingestion, storage, and API infrastructure. This approach aims to address the common pain points of building analytical backends, such as tool fragmentation, schema drift, and complex development workflows.

Key benefits of using Moose include type-safe data models, streamlined streaming and batch ingestion, real-time stream processing, in-database transformations, and simplified API creation. By defining data models in code, Moose eliminates the need to manually update database schemas, APIs, and message formats.

Moose also offers a local development environment that can be spun up with a single command, enabling rapid iteration and testing. This local environment mirrors the production environment, minimizing configuration and setup. Features like hot reloading allow developers to see changes reflected instantly across the entire stack.

The framework is modular and configurable, with ClickHouse as the default OLAP database, and Redpanda and Temporal optionally integrated for event streaming and workflow orchestration. Planned extensions include support for other data warehouses like Snowflake, Databricks, and BigQuery, as well as other event streaming platforms. Moose is designed for applications like user-facing analytics, BI, data warehouses, data migrations, event streaming, and ETL workloads.

title: Lessons learned operating petabyte-scale ClickHouse clusters: Part II
summary:
This article, the second in a series about operating petabyte-scale ClickHouse clusters, focuses on handling read traffic and related operational challenges. It stresses the importance of considering both reads and writes, as ingestion (writes) directly impacts read performance through the number of parts in a table.

The article covers handling different traffic types (real-time, long-running queries, and backfills), suggesting strategies like using different replicas and application-level load balancing to avoid impacting real-time query latency. Query design is crucial; the author emphasizes optimizing queries by filtering on sorting key columns first, using PREWHERE, and deferring complex operations. Settings like `max_threads`, `max_memory`, and `max_bytes_before_external_group_by` are also discussed.

Backfilling materialized views is highlighted as a potentially problematic area, with the author advising against using `POPULATE` due to data duplication risks. Instead, using a Null table and adjusting batch sizes are recommended.

Monitoring is critical, with emphasis on tracking queries, ZooKeeper/S3 errors, replication lag, and queue lengths. The author highlights key system tables (`system.query_log`, `system.processes`, `system.part_log`) as essential for troubleshooting.

Finally, the author touches on miscellaneous points like the default table deletion behavior, potential issues with materialized views and specific column types, and the importance of carefully managing `ON CLUSTER` operations. Altinity's knowledge base is recommended as a valuable resource for ClickHouse management.
chinese_title: 操作 Petabyte 级 ClickHouse 集群的经验教训：第二部分
chinese_summary:
本文是关于运营 PB 级 ClickHouse 集群系列文章的第二篇，重点介绍处理读取流量及相关运维挑战。文章强调了同时考虑读取和写入的重要性，因为摄取（写入）会通过表中的数据分片数量直接影响读取性能。

文章涵盖了处理不同流量类型（实时查询、长时间运行查询和回填），并提出了诸如使用不同副本和应用层负载均衡等策略，以避免影响实时查询延迟。查询设计至关重要；作者强调通过首先按排序键列进行过滤、使用 PREWHERE 以及延迟复杂操作来优化查询。文中还讨论了 `max_threads`、`max_memory` 和 `max_bytes_before_external_group_by` 等设置。

文章重点介绍了回填物化视图可能存在的问题，并建议不要使用 `POPULATE`，因为存在数据重复的风险。相反，建议使用 Null 表并调整批处理大小。

监控至关重要，重点是跟踪查询、ZooKeeper/S3 错误、复制延迟和队列长度。作者强调了关键系统表（`system.query_log`、`system.processes`、`system.part_log`）对于故障排除至关重要。

最后，作者还提到了诸如默认表删除行为、物化视图和特定列类型可能存在的问题以及谨慎管理 `ON CLUSTER` 操作的重要性等杂项。Altinity 的知识库被推荐为 ClickHouse 管理的宝贵资源。

title: Native visionOS platform support
summary:
This article discusses a proposed contribution to the Godot game engine: native support for Apple's visionOS platform. The contribution, spearheaded by Apple's visionOS engineering team, aims to allow Godot games to run natively on Vision Pro, both in planar windows and through immersive VR experiences using a new visionOS VR Plugin.

The contribution is structured in three incremental PRs: the first, detailed here, adds the native visionOS platform, largely reusing code from the existing iOS platform by creating a shared "apple_embedded" driver. Subsequent PRs will add Swift compilation support for immersive scenes and introduce the Vision Pro VR plugin.

The authors highlight the extensive testing performed using the Platformer demo project, confirming functionality on both iOS and visionOS with Metal rendering. They also acknowledge some missing functionality like dynamic DPI metrics and automated visionOS icon creation, inviting community contributions.

The article raises questions regarding documentation tooling and testing of certain features like plugin embedding, archive/IPA export, and direct deployment via ios_deploy.

Community members have expressed enthusiasm for the contribution, while also raising concerns about the potential proliferation of platforms and the maintenance burden. Suggestions include unifying the iOS-derived platforms under a single "ios" platform within Godot's codebase and using macros for platform-specific code exclusions.

title: Pixel is a unit of length and area
summary:
The article explores the inconsistent use of "pixel" as both a unit of length and area in digital imaging, leading to mathematical contradictions when applying dimensional analysis. When calculating area, multiplying pixel length by pixel height should result in square pixels (pixel²), but colloquial usage often treats pixels as dimensionless units where pixel² = pixel = 1.

The author proposes two imperfect solutions to reconcile this tension:

1.  **Define the pixel as a square:** A pixel is defined as a square with a physical size dependent on the device, and "pixel-side" or "√pixel" is introduced as the linear unit representing its width and height.
2.  **Treat the pixel as a unit of length:** In this approach, all area measurements must be expressed as square pixels, avoiding the "megapixel" abbreviation in favor of writing out the full number of square pixels or using awkward terms like square kilopixels.

The author notes that the pixel's non-metric nature and limited involvement in complex calculations mitigate the severity of this inconsistency. The issue mainly highlights the imperfections in common terminology and the deviation from the consistent unit behavior expected in scientific calculations. The author draws an analogy with the conflation of pounds as units of mass and force, contrasting it with the metric system's clear separation of kilograms and newtons.
chinese_title: 像素是一种长度和面积的单位。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了数字成像中“像素”作为长度和面积单位使用时出现的不一致性，导致在应用量纲分析时产生数学矛盾。在计算面积时，像素长度乘以像素高度应得到平方像素（像素²），但口语习惯通常将像素视为无量纲单位，其中像素² = 像素 = 1。

作者提出了两个并不完美的解决方案来调和这种矛盾：

1.  **将像素定义为正方形：** 将像素定义为具有物理尺寸的正方形，该尺寸取决于设备，并引入“像素边长”或“√像素”作为表示其宽度和高度的线性单位。
2.  **将像素视为长度单位：** 在这种方法中，所有面积测量必须表示为平方像素，避免使用“百万像素”的缩写，而是写出平方像素的完整数字或使用诸如平方千像素之类的笨拙术语。

作者指出，像素的非公制性质以及其在复杂计算中参与程度有限减轻了这种不一致性的严重性。该问题主要突出了常见术语的不完善以及与科学计算中预期的一致单位行为的偏差。作者将此与磅作为质量和力单位的混淆进行类比，并将其与公制系统中千克和牛顿的明确分离进行对比。

title: Atuin Desktop: Runbooks That Run

The Atuin team is already using Atuin Desktop for releasing their CLI, migrating infrastructure, spinning up environments, and managing database queries. Future plans include team accounts for enhanced collaboration and automatic runbook generation from shell history. Atuin Desktop promises to replace copy-pasting from Notion and Slack with an organized and efficient way to manage infrastructure and operations.

title: Apple and Meta fined millions for breaching EU law
summary:
The EU has fined Apple 500 million euros and Meta 200 million euros for violating the Digital Markets Act (DMA), landmark legislation aimed at curbing the power of Big Tech. This marks the first sanctions under the DMA, introduced in 2023. The EU Commission found that Apple restricted app developers from directing users to cheaper deals outside the App Store and that Meta's "pay-or-consent" model for Facebook and Instagram users breached the DMA, as it was in place up to November 2024.

Apple and Meta have criticized the decisions and plan to challenge the fines. Apple argues the EU is unfairly targeting them, while Meta claims the decision disadvantages American businesses and forces an inferior service. The EU maintains it's enforcing clear rules and that all companies operating within the EU must comply with its laws and respect European values.

The fines are considered modest compared to past EU antitrust penalties. The EU competition watchdog said Apple must remove the imposed restrictions and Meta's new version will be assesed to determine if it is DMA compliant. The companies have two months to comply or face further fines. While Apple avoided a fine in a separate browser options investigation, it was still charged with hindering sideloading. Meta's Marketplace also had it's DMA designation dropped as the number of users fell below the required threshold. The EU is encouraged by a U.S. court judgment against Google's ad tech practices and is urged to continue investigations into Google and X.
chinese_title: 苹果和Meta因违反欧盟法律被处以数百万美元罚款
chinese_summary:
欧盟因违反《数字市场法案》(DMA) 对苹果处以 5 亿欧元罚款，对 Meta 处以 2 亿欧元罚款。该法案旨在遏制大型科技公司的权力，是具有里程碑意义的立法。这是 2023 年推出 DMA 后的首次制裁。欧盟委员会发现，苹果限制应用程序开发商引导用户到 App Store 以外的更便宜的交易，并且 Meta 针对 Facebook 和 Instagram 用户的“付费或同意”模式违反了 DMA，因为该模式一直持续到 2024 年 11 月。

苹果和 Meta 批评了这些决定，并计划对罚款提出质疑。苹果辩称，欧盟对其进行不公平的针对，而 Meta 声称该决定不利于美国企业，并迫使其提供劣质服务。欧盟坚称，它正在执行明确的规则，所有在欧盟运营的公司都必须遵守其法律并尊重欧洲价值观。

与欧盟过去的反垄断处罚相比，这些罚款被认为是适度的。欧盟竞争监管机构表示，苹果必须取消实施的限制，Meta 的新版本将被评估以确定是否符合 DMA。两家公司有两个月的时间遵守规定，否则将面临进一步的罚款。虽然苹果在另一项浏览器选项调查中避免了罚款，但仍被指控阻碍侧载。Meta 的 Marketplace 也因用户数量低于所需阈值而取消了 DMA 认定。欧盟受到美国法院对谷歌广告技术行为判决的鼓舞，并被敦促继续调查谷歌和 X。

The project consists of `sapphire-core` (the core library handling package management logic) and `sapphire-cli` (the command-line interface).

Key features currently implemented include bottle and cask installation/uninstallation, parallel downloads/installs, automatic dependency resolution, and initial support for building Formulae from source.

The roadmap includes `upgrade`, `cleanup`, `reinstall`, and `init` commands, prefix isolation, and ongoing bug fixes.

Basic usage involves commands like `sapphire --help`, `update`, `search`, `info`, `install`, and `uninstall`. Building from source requires a Rust toolchain and involves cloning the repository and running `cargo build --release`.

Contributions are welcome, particularly in testing, bug reporting, test coverage, and CLI improvements. The project is licensed under the BSD-3-Clause license. Be aware that it is alpha software with no guarantees.

He explains how platforms like Facebook, initially designed for simple updates, have become cluttered with ads and irrelevant content, leading users to lose focus and "doom scroll."

This phenomenon extends beyond social media, impacting website design, where intentional complexity and "UX dark patterns" are used to hinder users from completing specific tasks, like deleting accounts or canceling subscriptions. Lees argues that this unnecessary complexity might eventually become detrimental, suggesting a "Laffer Curve of web design" where increased friction negatively impacts the user experience.

He highlights the EU's legislation requiring equal ease for subscribing and unsubscribing from services, advocating for "complexity" as a measure for legislation to protect consumers. title: Physicists Designed a Quantum Rubik's Cube and Found the Best Way to Solve It
summary:
Physicists at the University of Colorado Boulder have designed a "quantum Rubik's cube," a permutation puzzle that, unlike the classical Rubik's cube with its finite combinations, possesses infinite possible states due to the introduction of quantum superpositions. In this quantum version, a tile can be both moved and not moved simultaneously.

The researchers tested this concept on a simplified 2x2 grid puzzle with blue and green tiles, tasking classical, quantum, and combined solvers to arrange the tiles into a solved state. The classical solver could only swap adjacent tiles, the quantum solver could only use superpositions, and the combined solver could use either.

The combined solver, unsurprisingly, performed best, solving the puzzle in fewer moves on average. While the classical solver could sometimes reach the solution in fewer moves than the quantum solver, its average was higher due to occasional lengthy solutions. The quantum solver demonstrated more consistent, though slightly longer, solutions.

The key difference lies in the quantum advantage: The classical solver has to rely on the random collapse of superpositions into a solved state, while the quantum solver can directly manipulate these superpositions. The team also created a 3D version of the puzzle. While practical quantum puzzles could be built using ultracold atoms, the main purpose is theoretical exploration for mathematicians.

title: ClickHouse gets lazier and faster: Introducing lazy materialization
summary:
This article introduces lazy materialization, a new optimization in ClickHouse that significantly improves query performance, especially for Top N queries. Lazy materialization delays reading column data until it's absolutely necessary during query execution. This means ClickHouse only loads the columns needed for immediate operations like sorting, deferring the rest. This is especially effective when combined with LIMIT clauses, as much of the data in larger columns may never need to be read.

The article highlights ClickHouse's existing I/O optimization stack, which includes columnar storage, sparse primary indexes, secondary data-skipping indexes, projections, and PREWHERE clauses. These techniques reduce I/O by skipping unnecessary columns and pruning irrelevant data granules and rows. Lazy materialization complements these existing optimizations by ensuring that even after filtering, only the minimum required column data is loaded at each step.

A real-world example using the Amazon customer reviews dataset demonstrates the impact. A query retrieving top 5-star ebook reviews, initially taking 219 seconds with a full scan, improves drastically as each optimization layer is enabled. Lazy materialization played a key role in minimizing I/O by deferring the loading of large text columns (product_title, review_headline, review_body) until after sorting and applying the LIMIT clause. The article detailed how columnar storage is crucial for enabling this deferred I/O optimization.
chinese_title: ClickHouse变得更懒更高效：引入延迟物化

本文介绍了延迟物化，ClickHouse 中的一项新的优化技术，它能显著提升查询性能，尤其是在 Top N 查询中。 延迟物化会延迟读取列数据，直到查询执行期间绝对必要时才读取。 这意味着 ClickHouse 只加载用于排序等即时操作所需的列，而推迟加载其余列。 这与 LIMIT 子句结合使用时尤其有效，因为较大列中的许多数据可能永远不需要读取。

本文重点介绍了 ClickHouse 现有的 I/O 优化堆栈，其中包括列式存储、稀疏主键索引、二级数据跳过索引、投影和 PREWHERE 子句。 这些技术通过跳过不必要的列和修剪不相关的数据粒度和行来减少 I/O。 延迟物化是对这些现有优化的补充，它可以确保即使在过滤之后，也只在每个步骤加载所需的最小列数据。

一个使用亚马逊客户评论数据集的真实示例展示了其影响。 一个检索排名最高的五星级电子书评论的查询，最初需要 219 秒才能完成完整扫描，但随着每个优化层的启用，其性能得到了显著提高。 延迟物化在最大限度地减少 I/O 方面发挥了关键作用，它将大型文本列（product_title、review_headline、review_body）的加载推迟到排序和应用 LIMIT 子句之后。 本文详细介绍了列式存储对于启用这种延迟 I/O 优化至关重要。

title: Demystifying decorators: They don't need to be cryptic
summary:
This article demystifies Python decorators by breaking down the concept into manageable parts, focusing on closures and decorator introduction in the first two sections.

Part 1 explains closures by illustrating how to keep track of arguments passed to a function, `print()`, without using global variables. It demonstrates the limitations of local and global variables, and introduces the concept of a closure: an inner function accessing variables from its enclosing function's scope. This allows a function to access data that persists across multiple calls, enabling "communication" between calls. The article shows how to access the closed-over data using the `.__closure__` attribute, albeit in a less direct manner.

Part 2 builds on the understanding of closures to introduce decorators. It highlights how the earlier code already embodies aspects of a decorator, which enhances the functionality of a function. The article then refactors the code to create a reusable decorator that can be applied to any function, not just `print()`. This is achieved by: renaming the outer function to `store_arguments()`, adding a `func` parameter to the outer function to represent the function to be decorated, and allowing the inner function to accept any number of arguments. The article leads towards creating a more generic and reusable decorator, paving the way for more advanced decorator features to be discussed in subsequent parts.

第一部分解释了闭包，通过演示如何在不使用全局变量的情况下跟踪传递给函数 `print()` 的参数来说明。它展示了局部变量和全局变量的局限性，并介绍了闭包的概念：一个内部函数访问其封闭函数作用域中的变量。这使得函数可以访问在多次调用中持续存在的数据，从而实现调用之间的“通信”。文章展示了如何使用 `.__closure__` 属性访问封闭数据，尽管方式不太直接。

第二部分以对闭包的理解为基础，介绍装饰器。它强调了之前的代码已经体现了装饰器的各个方面，即增强函数的功能。然后，文章重构了代码，创建了一个可重用的装饰器，可以应用于任何函数，而不仅仅是 `print()`。这通过以下方式实现：将外部函数重命名为 `store_arguments()`，向外部函数添加一个 `func` 参数来表示要装饰的函数，并允许内部函数接受任意数量的参数。文章引导读者创建一个更通用和可重用的装饰器，为后续部分讨论更高级的装饰器特性铺平了道路。

title: Algebraic Semantics for Machine Knitting
summary:
Nat Hurtig's blog post explores the challenge of developing formal semantics for machine knitting, aiming to enable automated analysis and optimization like those used in traditional programming languages. Unlike traditional languages, machine knitting lacks rigorous semantics, hindering tasks like compiler optimization and program equivalence checking.

The post highlights the complexities introduced by the 3D nature of knitting, where over/under crossings of strands can create dependencies and prevent operations from commuting, even without direct data dependencies. Existing semantics based on knot theory, while mathematically rigorous, are not directly usable by computers due to their reliance on continuous deformations.

The author proposes leveraging algebraic topology, specifically the braid group, as a potential solution. The braid group uses algebraic structures to represent topological objects, like strands crossing each other, in a way that computers can process. The braid group uses generators and relations to define when two braids are equivalent.

The ultimate goal is to create a system where computers can reason about the behavior of machine knitting programs, leading to automated optimization, error checking, and other benefits similar to those enjoyed by traditional programming languages. The post draws interesting parallels between machine knitting, quantum computing, and the challenges of reasoning about spatial relationships in computation.

title: Subnanosecond Flash Memory
summary:
This article reports on the development of a subnanosecond flash memory utilizing a two-dimensional (2D) Dirac graphene-channel and a 2D-enhanced hot-carrier-injection mechanism. The research addresses the need for faster non-volatile memory in the age of AI, overcoming the speed limitations of existing flash memory and the volatility of SRAM.

The key innovation lies in using the atomically thin properties of 2D materials to optimize the horizontal electric field (Ey) distribution, leading to enhanced hot-carrier injection (2D-HCI). The study demonstrates that graphene and tungsten diselenide (WSe2) exhibit material-dependent hot-carrier injection behaviors. Graphene facilitates both electron and hole injection due to its Dirac nature, while WSe2 primarily supports hole injection.

The graphene-based flash memory achieved a program speed of 400 picoseconds at a low program voltage of 5V, with robust endurance over 5.5 × 10^6 cycles. The improved Ey-assisted program efficiency increases the injection current.

The research contrasts the 2D-HCI mechanism with the limitations of silicon-based flash memory, where the electric field acceleration is less efficient. A quasi-2D model is used to explain how the thin-body channel of 2D materials enhances the electric field distribution, leading to superior injection efficiency. The findings demonstrate that flash memory can surpass the speed of volatile SRAM.

该研究将二维热载流子注入机制与硅基闪存的局限性进行了对比，硅基闪存的电场加速效率较低。使用准二维模型来解释二维材料的薄体通道如何增强电场分布，从而实现卓越的注入效率。研究结果表明，闪存可以超越易失性SRAM的速度。

title: π0.5: A VLA with open-world generalization
summary:
This article introduces π0.5, a new Vision-Language-Action (VLA) model designed for improved open-world generalization in robotics. Unlike previous models that perform well in controlled environments, π0.5 demonstrates the ability to generalize to entirely new and "messy" environments like homes, enabling robots to perform complex tasks such as cleaning or tidying up in unseen locations.

The key innovation behind π0.5 is co-training on heterogeneous data, combining diverse sources including robotic demonstrations, multimodal web data (image captioning, object detection), verbal instructions, and data from various robot types. This approach allows the model to learn both physical skills and semantic understanding of tasks. The article highlights that the right mixture of these data sources acts as a "curriculum," enabling generalization across different levels of abstraction.

Experiments show that π0.5 outperforms models trained without certain data sources, particularly excelling in identifying new objects and performing tasks in out-of-distribution environments.  A scaling study demonstrates that performance improves with the number of training environments, reaching levels comparable to models trained directly on the test environment after exposure to around 100 diverse training locations.

π0.5 utilizes a hierarchical approach, first generating a high-level textual action and then selecting appropriate low-level motor commands using a flow-matching action expert. The model's capabilities are showcased in videos demonstrating long-horizon tasks in new homes, its robustness to environmental changes and human interference, and its ability to follow language commands at varying levels of detail.

title: We Have Made No Progress Toward AGI
summary:
This article argues that Large Language Models (LLMs) have made no real progress toward Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), despite appearances. It claims LLMs are fundamentally "braindead" statistical models, not reasoning machines. The author cites Anthropic's research using "attribution graphs" to peek inside LLM reasoning processes, revealing a complex web of heuristics and memorized patterns instead of genuine algorithmic understanding.

Key points include:

*   **LLMs don't reason like humans:** Internal processes don't resemble human reasoning, and LLM explanations for their outputs are often fabricated ("hallucinated").
*   **"Chain-of-thought" is unreliable:** These steps are learned patterns, not actual representations of the model's internal thinking.
*   **AI agents are not a solution:** LLMs can hallucinate tool usage, corrupting the entire data pipeline.
*   **LLM architecture tweaks are isolated:** Improvements can have unintended negative side effects, with newer models sometimes performing worse on specific tasks.
*   **LLMs can't construct hard rules:** They only determine what is "probably" right based on past data, requiring constant retraining.
*   **Progress is just scaling:** Improvement is achieved through massive scaling of statistical models, not through actual intelligence.
*   **Current benchmarks are misleading:** They don't capture real-world performance.
*   **Focus on efficiency:** Progress toward AGI should be measured by capability relative to data and training effort, with a decrease in both being a positive sign. No modal collapse in closed systems.

The author concludes that the pursuit of AGI needs to shift away from simply scaling statistical models and towards architectures that demonstrate true understanding and reasoning capabilities.
chinese_title: 我们尚未在通用人工智能方面取得任何进展
chinese_summary:
本文认为，尽管表面看来如此，大型语言模型（LLMs）在实现通用人工智能（AGI）方面并未取得实质性进展。文章声称，LLMs本质上是“脑死亡”的统计模型，而非推理机器。作者引用了Anthropic的研究，该研究使用“归因图”来窥探LLM的推理过程，揭示了一个由启发式和记忆模式组成的复杂网络，而非真正的算法理解。

关键点包括：

*   **LLMs的推理方式不像人类：** 内部过程不像人类推理，LLM对其输出的解释通常是捏造的（“幻觉”）。
*   **“思维链”不可靠：** 这些步骤是学习到的模式，并非模型内部思考的真实表征。
*   **人工智能代理并非解决方案：** LLMs可能会产生工具使用方面的幻觉，从而破坏整个数据管道。
*   **LLM架构调整是孤立的：** 改进可能会产生意想不到的负面副作用，较新的模型有时在特定任务上的表现更差。
*   **LLMs无法构建硬性规则：** 它们只能根据过去的数据来确定什么是“可能”正确的，需要不断地重新训练。
*   **进步仅仅是规模化：** 改进是通过大规模扩展统计模型来实现的，而不是通过真正的智能。
*   **当前的基准具有误导性：** 它们不能捕捉现实世界的表现。
*   **关注效率：** 衡量AGI的进展应该以能力相对于数据和训练工作的效率来衡量，数据和训练工作量的减少是一个积极的信号。封闭系统中没有模态崩溃。

作者的结论是，追求AGI需要从简单地扩展统计模型转向能够展示真正理解和推理能力的架构。

title: Ping, You've Got Whale: AI detection system alerts ships of whales in their path

The system uses heat-sensing cameras and machine learning to identify whale spouts and relay the information to experts, who then forward validated alerts to ships, allowing them to change course.

Developed by Daniel Zitterbart at Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution, WhaleSpotter has significantly improved since its 2019 inception, with over 51,000 marine mammal detections in 2024. A key challenge lies in equipping large container ships, which are major contributors to whale fatalities. By adapting the technology, the system can now reliably spot whales up to 6 kilometers away from these larger vessels.

While not yet providing real-time alerts to container ships, testing on Matson Navigation Company's ships in Hawai'i, Alaska, and the U.S. west coast has shown promising results. Zitterbart emphasizes the importance of human validation to avoid false alarms, as the system is intended for marine conservation, aiming for zero false positives to maintain the attention of ship captains. Other AI systems exist, but WhaleSpotter distinguishes itself by prioritizing human oversight.

Marine biologist John Calambokidis highlights real-time detection as a crucial, yet underutilized, strategy for whale conservation. As WhaleSpotter expands, its developers hope that broader adoption will enable real-time information sharing, ultimately saving more whales from ship strikes, especially endangered species like the North Atlantic right whale.

summary:
Elena Kazamia's article "The Last of Their Kind" explores the desperate efforts to resurrect the northern white rhino population, which is functionally extinct with only two remaining individuals, Najin and Fatu. The primary focus is on the BioRescue project, led by Thomas Hildebrandt, which uses advanced reproductive technologies like in-vitro fertilization (IVF) and gene editing to create northern white rhino embryos from Fatu's eggs and cryopreserved sperm from deceased males. These embryos are intended to be implanted into southern white rhino surrogates.

The article highlights the challenges and setbacks faced, including the death of a surrogate carrying a northern white rhino fetus. It also discusses the partnership with Colossal Biosciences, a company known for its efforts to "resurrect" extinct species using ancient DNA, to enhance genetic diversity in the embryos.

The piece raises ethical questions about the focus on resurrecting one species when other conservation efforts and species also desperately need resources and protection. title: Are polynomial features the root of all evil? (2024)
summary:
This article challenges the common belief that high-degree polynomial features are inherently problematic in machine learning, arguing that they are often unfairly maligned due to misconceptions and improper usage. The author contends that high-degree polynomials can be effectively controlled with standard machine learning tools like regularization when used correctly.

The first misconception addressed is the choice of basis. The standard polynomial basis (1, x, x^2, ...) is identified as a key culprit for instability and overfitting. The author introduces alternative polynomial bases like Chebyshev and Legendre polynomials, commonly used in approximation theory. However, these are optimized for interpolation, not fitting noisy data.

The article champions the Bernstein basis as a superior choice for machine learning. The Bernstein basis polynomials, used in computer graphics, offer several advantages: all coefficients share the same "units," making them easier to regularize, and the polynomial function is a weighted average of these coefficients.

The second misconception concerns the Weierstrass approximation theorem. The theorem states polynomials can approximate continuous functions within an interval, implying the need to normalize input features to lie within a specific range (e.g., [0, 1]) when using polynomial features.

The article demonstrates these concepts by fitting a sine-like function to noisy data using various polynomial bases, highlighting the instability of the standard, Chebyshev, and Legendre bases, and the stability and regularization-friendliness of the Bernstein basis. It concludes that with proper representation and normalization, high-degree polynomials can be powerful and controllable non-linear features.
chinese_title: 多项式特征是万恶之源吗？(2024)
chinese_summary:
本文挑战了一种普遍的观点，即高阶多项式特征在机器学习中本质上是有问题的。文章认为，由于误解和不当使用，它们常常被不公平地诋毁。作者认为，如果使用得当，高阶多项式可以通过诸如正则化等标准的机器学习工具有效地控制。

首先要解决的误解是基的选择。标准多项式基（1, x, x^2, ...）被认为是导致不稳定和过拟合的关键原因。作者介绍了一些替代的多项式基，例如在逼近理论中常用的切比雪夫和勒让德多项式。然而，这些基针对插值进行了优化，而不是拟合噪声数据。

本文推崇伯恩斯坦基作为机器学习的更优选择。伯恩斯坦基多项式在计算机图形学中使用，具有几个优点：所有系数共享相同的“单位”，使其更容易正则化，并且多项式函数是这些系数的加权平均值。

第二个误解涉及维尔斯特拉斯逼近定理。该定理指出，多项式可以在一个区间内逼近连续函数，这意味着在使用多项式特征时，需要将输入特征归一化，使其位于特定范围内（例如[0, 1]）。

本文通过使用各种多项式基将正弦函数拟合到噪声数据来演示这些概念，突出了标准基、切比雪夫基和勒让德基的不稳定性，以及伯恩斯坦基的稳定性和易于正则化。文章最后得出结论，通过适当的表示和归一化，高阶多项式可以成为强大且可控的非线性特征。

title: Abusing DuckDB-WASM by making SQL draw 3D graphics (Sort Of)
summary:
This article details an experiment where the author built a rudimentary 3D game engine, specifically a text-based Doom clone, using DuckDB-WASM, an analytical database, for core game logic instead of conventional JavaScript. The entire game world, including the map, player position, enemy/bullet locations, and game settings, resides within DuckDB tables. Player movement, bullet physics, and collision detection are all handled via SQL queries (UPDATE and DELETE statements).

The rendering is achieved by defining a SQL VIEW named `render_3d_frame` that performs raycasting using recursive CTEs. This view calculates wall distances, heights, and then assembles the text-based 3D scene using string aggregation. JavaScript is used to glue everything together, handle keyboard input, run the game loop, fetch the background frame from the SQL view, manage sprites (bullets, enemies), and perform a Z-buffer check to determine if sprites should be drawn over the wall at a particular screen column.

The author discusses several challenges encountered: loading DuckDB-WASM correctly, SQL dialect differences (AUTOINCREMENT vs SEQUENCE), query planner limitations when using table functions (generate_series), async/setInterval race conditions, and implementing Z-buffer logic for sprites. The solution to these problems range from refactoring the SQL to be more planner friendly to adding a processing lock to the async main loop.

The final result is a playable game running at approximately 6-7 FPS. While unconventional, the project demonstrates the unexpected power of SQL and DuckDB-WASM for tasks outside their intended purpose. The core lesson is that it is possible to perform complex state management and rendering with SQL, albeit with performance considerations.

title: The Rise and Fall of Toys 'R' Us (2018)
summary:
Erin Blakemore's "Inside the Rise and Fall of Toys ‘R’ Us" details the evolution of the iconic toy retailer from its inception to its eventual demise. Founded by Charles Lazarus in 1948 as Children's Bargain Town, specializing in baby goods, it transitioned to toys as Lazarus recognized recurring customer needs. In 1957, the company rebranded as Toys ‘R’ Us, pioneering the big-box toy store concept, taking a supermarket-style approach with vast selections at low prices, effectively becoming the first "category killer."

Toys ‘R’ Us capitalized on the post-war baby boom and a growing toy industry, fueled by television advertising and iconic toys like Barbie and Mr. Potato Head. The company leveraged its size to negotiate lower prices, driving smaller competitors out of business and dominating the market, controlling 25% of the world's toy market at its peak.

However, several factors contributed to its downfall. These included the rise of e-commerce, evolving toy preferences, a leveraged buyout in 2005, and increasingly dated stores. Ironically, the big-box model it helped create also contributed to its demise, with competitors like Wal-Mart and Amazon offering similar products at lower prices. The company's attempt to compete by cutting back on its toy selection and focusing on price ultimately diminished the magic that had initially made Toys ‘R’ Us successful, leading to its bankruptcy in 2017.
chinese_title: 玩具反斗城的兴衰 (2018)
chinese_summary:
艾琳·布莱克莫尔的《玩具反斗城兴衰内幕》详细讲述了这家标志性玩具零售商从创立到最终倒闭的演变过程。它由查尔斯·拉扎勒斯于1948年创立，最初名为儿童廉价商品城，专门经营婴儿用品，后来随着拉扎勒斯意识到顾客的重复需求，转型为玩具销售。1957年，公司更名为玩具反斗城，开创了大型玩具商店的概念，采取超市式经营方式，以低廉的价格提供大量选择，有效地成为了第一个“品类杀手”。

玩具反斗城充分利用了战后婴儿潮和玩具行业的增长，并受到电视广告和芭比娃娃、土豆先生等标志性玩具的推动。该公司利用其规模优势来谈判更低的价格，将规模较小的竞争对手挤出市场，并占据了主导地位，在其鼎盛时期控制了全球玩具市场25%的份额。

然而，多种因素促成了它的衰落，包括电子商务的兴起、玩具偏好的演变、2005年的杠杆收购以及日益过时的门店。具有讽刺意味的是，它所帮助创建的大型商店模式也导致了它的 demise，沃尔玛和亚马逊等竞争对手以更低的价格提供类似的产品。该公司试图通过削减玩具选择和专注于价格来参与竞争，最终削弱了最初使玩具反斗城成功的魔力，导致其在2017年破产。

title: Hyperwood – Open-Source Furniture
summary:
Hyperwood is an open-source furniture system inspired by "Small is Beautiful" and Autoprogettazione, designed to allow anyone to create robust furniture from simple wooden slats with minimal tools and locally sourced materials. It aims to empower DIY enthusiasts, designers, and small manufacturers.

The core of Hyperwood lies in algorithmic generation of personalized construction plans and optimized material lists, promoting accessibility, sustainability, and waste reduction in furniture building. While currently more suitable for individuals with programming knowledge due to the specialized tools, the long-term vision is to create graphical user interfaces (GUIs) that will broaden its accessibility to a wider audience. In essence, Hyperwood provides a method for creating custom furniture in a sustainable and efficient way, prioritizing local resources and user empowerment.
chinese_title: 超木 - 开源家具
chinese_summary:
Hyperwood是一个开源家具系统，灵感来源于“小即是美”和Autoprogettazione，旨在让任何人都能用简单的木条，最少的工具和本地采购的材料创造出坚固的家具。它旨在赋能DIY爱好者、设计师和小制造商。

Hyperwood的核心在于个性化施工计划和优化材料清单的算法生成，从而促进家具制造的可及性、可持续性和减少浪费。虽然目前由于专业工具的原因，更适合具备编程知识的个人，但其长期愿景是创建图形用户界面（GUI），从而扩大其对更广泛受众的可访问性。本质上，Hyperwood提供了一种以可持续和高效的方式创建定制家具的方法，优先考虑本地资源和用户赋权。

title: The Ghosts of Gaelic
summary:
Duncan Sneddon's "The Ghosts of Gaelic" examines the state of the Gaelic language and culture in Scotland, particularly in light of the 2005 Gaelic Language Act and the upcoming Scottish Languages Bill. While Gaelic is spoken by a small but growing percentage of the population and efforts are underway to promote it, the language faces existential threats due to the dominance of English and socio-economic challenges in Gaelic-speaking communities.

The article delves into the complex relationship between Gaelic culture and English, using the example of James Macpherson's Ossian cycle. Macpherson's popular, but controversial, translations of Gaelic legends brought international attention to Scottish heritage but were later criticised for inauthenticity. Sneddon argues that Ossian, while significant, should not overshadow the broader and older Gaelic tradition of the Finn Cycle. This oral tradition, featuring narratives of Fionn mac Cumhail and his warriors, has been actively maintained and documented by institutions like the Irish Folklore Commission and the School of Scottish Studies.

Sneddon emphasises the need to shift away from an anglophone-centric view and allow Gaelic communities to preserve and express their culture in their own language. He argues that for the Scottish Languages Bill to truly succeed, it must prioritize the needs of Gaelic and Scots-speaking communities, particularly through funding and community-based language planning. While Gaelic education and broadcasting have seen progress, similar support is crucial for community development to ensure the survival and future vitality of the Gaelic language and its rich cultural heritage.
chinese_title: 盖尔语的幽灵
chinese_summary:
邓肯·斯内登的《盖尔语的幽灵》考察了苏格兰盖尔语语言和文化的现状，尤其是在2005年盖尔语语言法案和即将出台的苏格兰语言法案的背景下。虽然盖尔语的使用者占人口比例较小但正在增长，并且正在努力推广它，但由于英语的优势以及盖尔语社区面临的社会经济挑战，该语言面临着生存威胁。

这篇文章深入探讨了盖尔文化和英语之间复杂的关系，并以詹姆斯·麦克弗森的奥西安诗篇为例。麦克弗森对盖尔语传说的广受欢迎但备受争议的翻译，为苏格兰的传统带来了国际关注，但后来因其不真实性而受到批评。斯内登认为，奥西安虽然意义重大，但不应掩盖芬恩循环更广泛和更古老的盖尔语传统。这个口头传统，以芬恩·麦克库米尔和他的战士的叙述为特色，已被爱尔兰民间传说委员会和苏格兰研究学院等机构积极维护和记录。

斯内登强调需要摆脱以英语为中心的观点，让盖尔语社区用自己的语言保护和表达他们的文化。他认为，为了使苏格兰语言法案真正成功，它必须优先考虑盖尔语和苏格兰语社区的需求，特别是通过资金和基于社区的语言规划。虽然盖尔语教育和广播已经取得进展，但类似的支持对于社区发展至关重要，以确保盖尔语及其丰富的文化遗产的生存和未来活力。

title: Projects for Old OS X
summary:
This website, "Projects for Old OS X," chronicles the author's journey back to older macOS versions and their efforts to make these systems usable in the modern era. Frustrated with modern macOS, the author provides a collection of projects aimed at fixing broken functionality, enhancing capabilities, and improving the overall experience on older versions of OS X.

The projects are categorized into several areas: Fixed Dashboard Widgets (Weather, Unit Converter, Translation), Web Browsing & Internet (Chromium Legacy Downloader, Legacy Mac Proxy, Transmission, Apple Mail Security Fix), Audio & Video (QuickTime tweaks, FFusion codec support, helper apps for opening various video and image formats, video downloader, media subscription preference pane), Games & Emulators (OpenEmu Lite, Dolphin for Legacy OS X, Steam API Emulator), System Tweaks (SIMBL, Snow Leopard window controls, emoji update), Miscellaneous Apps (SyncThing, Side Button Enabler), and Bugfixes for Other People's Apps (Pages '09, CodeRunner).

These projects range from updating widgets with new APIs to patching security vulnerabilities and providing compatibility with modern codecs and file formats. The author often provides modified versions of existing software, ensuring compatibility and addressing limitations of older macOS versions. Downloads are provided for each project, and source code is often included or available upon request. The target OS versions generally range from OS X 10.4 to 10.14, with a focus on OS X 10.9 (Mavericks).

title: Supabase raises $200M Series D at $2B valuation
summary:
Supabase, an open-source application development platform, has raised a $200 million Series D funding round at a $2 billion valuation, led by Accel. The round also included participation from Coatue, Y Combinator, Craft Ventures, Felicis, and notable angels like Kevin Weil (OpenAI), Guillermo Rauch (Vercel), and Taylor Otwell (Laravel).

Accel's investment involved a dedicated effort, with partners traveling to New Zealand to meet co-founder and CEO Paul Copplestone. Accel believes Supabase has the potential to become a dominant force in the database layer, supporting the popular Postgres database system as an alternative to Firebase.

Supabase aims to be a comprehensive backend solution for developers, including "vibe coders" (those using AI tools), and is currently used by two million developers managing over 3.5 million databases. Vercel's CEO, Guillermo Rauch, highlights the synergy between vibe coding and Supabase's easy-to-use, accessible platform.

Founded in 2020 and fully remote, Supabase actively fosters a global community, with a significant portion of its employees being former founders themselves. The company encourages collaboration through initiatives like launch weeks and in-person meetups in cities worldwide. The name "Supabase" was chosen partly as a playful reference to the Nicki Minaj song "Super Bass."

Supabase旨在成为开发人员（包括使用人工智能工具的“vibe coders”）的全面后端解决方案，目前有两百万开发者使用它来管理超过350万个数据库。Vercel的首席执行官Guillermo Rauch强调了vibe coding与Supabase易于使用、易于访问的平台之间的协同作用。

title: The complex origin story of domestic cats
summary:
Two new large-scale studies challenge previous assumptions about the origin and spread of domestic cats in Europe, suggesting a more complex and recent history than previously thought. Both studies point to Tunisia as the likely origin.

One study, led by the University of Rome Tor Vergata, analyzed ancient cat genomes from across Europe and Anatolia. Their findings suggest domestic cats only appeared in Europe around the 1st century CE, much later than previously believed. They identified two waves of introduction: one bringing wildcats from Northwest Africa to Sardinia around the 2nd century BCE, and another introducing cats genetically similar to modern domestic lines during the Roman Imperial period.

The second study, led by the University of Exeter, analyzed archaeological bones and genetic data, concluding that domestic cats were present in Europe by the early first millennium BCE, predating the height of Roman expansion. They also identified Tunisia as the origin point. Both studies highlight the role of cultural and religious factors in the domestication and translocation of cats, pointing to their veneration in ancient Egypt and their association with goddesses in Greek/Roman and Norse mythology.

Both studies also documented the impact of domestic cats on European wildcat populations, suggesting a decline due to competition, disease, and hybridization. Overall, the research suggests that cats didn't simply follow early farmers, but arrived in Europe in multiple waves, driven by human cultural practices, trade, and religious beliefs, challenging the long-held view of a primarily commensal relationship. The studies underscore the limitations of relying solely on mitochondrial DNA markers in understanding feline domestication.
chinese_title: 家猫的复杂起源
chinese_summary:
两项新大型研究挑战了先前关于欧洲家猫起源和传播的假设，表明其历史比先前认为的更为复杂和近期。两项研究都指向突尼斯作为可能的起源地。

一项由罗马第二大学领导的研究分析了来自欧洲和安纳托利亚的古代猫基因组。他们的发现表明，家猫直到公元1世纪左右才出现在欧洲，比之前认为的要晚得多。他们确定了两次引入浪潮：一次是公元前2世纪左右将非洲西北部的野猫带到撒丁岛，另一次是在罗马帝国时期引入与现代家猫品系基因相似的猫。

第二项由埃克塞特大学领导的研究分析了考古骨骼和遗传数据，得出结论认为，家猫在公元前一千年初就已经存在于欧洲，早于罗马扩张的鼎盛时期。他们还确定突尼斯为起源地。两项研究都强调了文化和宗教因素在猫的驯化和迁移中的作用，指出它们在古埃及受到崇拜，并且与希腊/罗马和挪威神话中的女神有关。

两项研究还记录了家猫对欧洲野猫种群的影响，表明由于竞争、疾病和杂交，数量有所下降。总的来说，这项研究表明，猫不仅仅是跟随早期农民而来，而是通过人类文化习俗、贸易和宗教信仰，分多个浪潮抵达欧洲，挑战了长期以来主要以共生关系为主的观点。这些研究强调了仅依靠线粒体DNA标记来理解猫科动物驯化的局限性。

title: More details for London's new Roman Basilica museum revealed
summary:
A new museum showcasing Roman London's history is planned for the City of London, following the discovery of significant Roman basilica ruins during pre-construction excavations for a skyscraper. The developer is reworking their plans to incorporate the museum into the building's basement.

The original development plans involved a tower above a public hall, with a 5th-floor viewing terrace. The discovery of the Roman ruins has led to internal redesigns. The basement, initially intended for facilities and cycle parking, will now house the museum. This change necessitates moving these facilities to street level and a reduction in the tower's height due to adjustments in the concrete core.

The museum will be accessible via lifts or stairs from the public hall. The exhibition will feature an immersive display of the Roman basilica remains and their historical context. A glass floor will be installed above the actual ruins for preservation, allowing visitors to view them from above. An education space and a long corridor for displaying artifacts are also planned.

The museum, curated in partnership with the London Museum, will be free to enter. The addition of the museum is expected to benefit the cafes and restaurants planned for the building's ground-floor public hall. The revised plans are currently under review by the City of London.
chinese_title: 伦敦新建罗马巴西利卡博物馆更多细节披露
chinese_summary:
伦敦市计划新建一座博物馆，展示罗马伦敦的历史。此前，在一座摩天大楼的施工前挖掘过程中，发现了重要的罗马巴西利卡遗址。开发商正在修改方案，将博物馆纳入大楼的地下室。

最初的开发计划包括一座位于公共大厅上方的塔楼，以及一个位于五楼的观景平台。罗马遗址的发现导致了内部的重新设计。最初计划用于设施和自行车停车的地下室，现在将容纳博物馆。这一改变需要将这些设施移至地面层，并由于混凝土核心的调整而降低塔楼的高度。

博物馆将通过电梯或楼梯从公共大厅进入。展览将以沉浸式的方式展示罗马巴西利卡遗迹及其历史背景。为了保护遗址，将在实际遗址上方安装玻璃地板，让游客可以从上方观看。还计划设置一个教育空间和一个用于展示文物的长走廊。

该博物馆与伦敦博物馆合作策划，将免费入场。博物馆的增加预计将有利于计划在大楼底层公共大厅开设的咖啡馆和餐厅。修订后的计划目前正在接受伦敦市的审查。

title: Surprises in Logic (2016)
summary:
John Baez's "Surprises in Logic" explores the limitations of mathematical proof, particularly regarding complexity. The article centers on Chaitin's incompleteness theorem, which states that there exists a complexity barrier, a number L, such that we cannot prove that any specific bit string has a Kolmogorov complexity (shortest program length) exceeding L.  The article notes that while arbitrarily complex things exist, proving their complexity exceeds a certain threshold is impossible.

The author discusses the paradox by providing an approximate size for L, estimating it to be a few kilobytes for a reasonable programming language and system of math. He notes Bruce Smith's estimation and muses about the possibility of a small program creating a video that depicts the evolution of computing culminating in itself.

Baez explains the proof of Chaitin's theorem, highlighting the role of Peano arithmetic and the concept of a program U that searches for proofs of complexity exceeding a given number. He explores Smith's reservations about implementing this in C due to the lack of well-defined semantics regarding machine size.

Finally, the article touches on the Kritchman-Raz proof of Gödel's second incompleteness theorem, using a rigorous version of the surprise examination paradox and Chaitin's incompleteness theorem. This approach demonstrates that if a system of math can prove its own consistency, it is not actually consistent. The article is simplified to make the complex concepts understandable.
chinese_title: 逻辑中的惊喜 (2016)
chinese_summary:
约翰·巴埃兹的《逻辑中的惊奇》探讨了数学证明的局限性，尤其是在复杂性方面。 文章以蔡廷不完备性定理为中心，该定理指出存在一个复杂性屏障，一个数字 L，使得我们无法证明任何特定的位串的柯尔莫哥洛夫复杂性（最短程序长度）超过 L。 文章指出，虽然任意复杂的事物存在，但证明它们的复杂性超过某个阈值是不可能的。

作者通过提供 L 的近似大小来讨论这个悖论，估计对于一个合理的编程语言和数学系统来说，L 大约是几千字节。 他提到了 Bruce Smith 的估计，并思考了一个小程序创建一个视频，描述计算的演变最终达到它本身的可能性。

巴埃兹解释了蔡廷定理的证明，强调了皮亚诺算术的作用以及程序 U 的概念，该程序 U 搜索超过给定数字的复杂性证明。 他探讨了 Smith 对用 C 实现此功能的保留意见，原因是缺乏关于机器大小的明确定义的语义。

最后，文章提到了 Kritchman-Raz 对哥德尔第二不完备性定理的证明，使用了惊喜考试悖论和蔡廷不完备性定理的严格版本。 这种方法表明，如果一个数学系统能够证明其自身的一致性，那么它实际上是不一致的。 这篇文章被简化，以使复杂的概念易于理解。

title: Native American names extend earthquake history of northeastern North America
summary:
Seismologist John Ebel suggests incorporating Native American knowledge, specifically place names and oral histories, to extend the recorded earthquake history of northeastern North America beyond the past 400 years of written records. Ebel presented his ideas at the Seismological Society of America's Annual Meeting, emphasizing the potential to better understand earthquake hazards in the region.

Ebel highlights examples like Moodus, Connecticut, derived from an Algonquian word meaning "place of noises," where unexplained "booms" have been reported for centuries and modern seismology has identified earthquake swarms. Another example is Mount Nashoba near Boston, which translates to "hill that shakes" in a Native American language, aligning with the area's regular small earthquake activity.

Ebel proposes that researching tribes with words for "earthquake," such as the Seneca, Cayuga, Natick, and Mi'kmaq, can indicate frequent seismic events in their territories. He advocates for interdisciplinary collaboration between seismologists and ethnologists to analyze Native American languages and narratives, potentially enabling estimations of earthquake intensity based on descriptions within these stories. Using such collaboration, the earthquake record can be expanded beyond the 400 years of European records.
chinese_title: 美洲原住民名称延伸北美东北部地震历史
chinese_summary:
地震学家约翰·埃贝尔建议结合美洲原住民的知识，特别是地名和口述历史，以扩展北美东北部有记录的地震历史，使其超出过去400年的书面记录范围。埃贝尔在美国地震学会年会上提出了他的想法，强调了更好地了解该地区地震灾害的潜力。

埃贝尔强调了一些例子，如康涅狄格州的穆杜斯（Moodus），这个名字源于阿尔冈昆语，意思是“噪音之地”，几个世纪以来，那里一直有无法解释的“巨响”报告，而现代地震学已经确定了地震群。另一个例子是波士顿附近的纳肖巴山（Mount Nashoba），在一种美洲原住民语言中，它的意思是“震动的山”，这与该地区经常发生的小地震活动相吻合。

埃贝尔提出，研究塞内卡、卡尤加、纳提克和米克马克等拥有“地震”一词的部落，可以表明其领土内频繁发生地震事件。他提倡地震学家和民族学家进行跨学科合作，分析美洲原住民的语言和叙事，从而有可能根据这些故事中的描述来估计地震烈度。通过这种合作，可以将地震记录扩展到欧洲记录的400年之外。

title: Show HN: I open-sourced my AI toy company that runs on ESP32 and OpenAI realtime
summary:
This "Show HN" post introduces ElatoAI, an open-source project creating an AI toy company powered by an ESP32 microcontroller and OpenAI's real-time API. It enables real-time, uninterrupted speech-to-speech conversations with custom AI agents globally.

The project consists of three main components: a Next.js frontend for agent creation and device management, a Deno edge server for handling WebSocket communication and OpenAI API calls, and an ESP32 IoT client for audio processing and interaction. Key features include custom agent creation, customizable voices, secure WebSockets, server-side voice activity detection, Opus audio compression, and global edge performance.

The post details the DIY hardware design, including setup instructions for Supabase, Next.js frontend, Deno server, and ESP32 Arduino client. It outlines the tech stack, architecture, and PlatformIO configuration. The project boasts sub-second latency, high-quality audio via Opus codec, and up to 10 minutes of continuous conversation. Security is ensured through secure WebSockets, optional API key encryption, and Supabase's authentication and row-level security.

Limitations include a 3-4 second cold start, a 10-minute conversation limit, and the absence of speech interruption detection on the ESP32. The project encourages contributions focusing on interruption detection, Arduino IDE support, and tool calling. It is licensed under the MIT License, and contributors are welcome.
chinese_title: 展示一下HN：我开源了我的AI玩具公司，它基于ESP32和OpenAI实时运行

该帖子详细介绍了DIY硬件设计，包括Supabase、Next.js前端、Deno服务器和ESP32 Arduino客户端的设置说明。它概述了技术栈、架构和PlatformIO配置。该项目具有亚秒级延迟，通过Opus编解码器实现高质量音频，以及长达10分钟的连续对话。通过安全的WebSocket、可选的API密钥加密和Supabase的身份验证和行级安全性来确保安全。

局限性包括3-4秒的冷启动、10分钟的对话限制以及ESP32上缺少语音中断检测。该项目鼓励大家贡献，重点是中断检测、Arduino IDE支持和工具调用。它以MIT许可证授权，欢迎贡献者。

title: David Tong Lectures on Theoretical Physics
summary:
David Tong's popular lecture notes on theoretical physics have evolved into a series of textbooks published by Cambridge University Press. He encourages purchasing the books despite the availability of the free lecture notes because they offer expanded content, improved explanations, and corrected details (like the spelling of "Schwarzschild"). Notably, the paperback versions are priced affordably. Four books are currently available.

The text emphasizes the high regard the books have garnered within the physics community. Prominent physicists, including Nobel Laureate Frank Wilczek, Lisa Randall, Juan Maldacena, Nathan Seiberg, Sandip Trivedi, Sean Carroll, and Rajesh Gopakumar, offer glowing reviews. They praise Tong's clear, engaging writing style, his ability to convey both technical details and fundamental principles, and the books' comprehensive coverage of undergraduate and graduate curriculum. Several reviewers draw comparisons to the classic Landau and Lifshitz series, suggesting Tong's books could become similarly influential and essential for physicists. The reviews highlight the books' ability to provide instruction, insight, joy, and to reveal the interconnectedness of physics concepts.
chinese_title: 戴维·佟理论物理讲义
chinese_summary:
戴维·唐的理论物理学讲义广受欢迎，现已发展成剑桥大学出版社出版的一系列教科书。他鼓励购买这些书，尽管有免费的讲义可供使用，因为这些书提供了扩展的内容、改进的解释以及更正的细节（例如“Schwarzschild”的拼写）。值得注意的是，平装版价格实惠。目前有四本书可供选择。

这些书在物理学界广受好评。包括诺贝尔奖获得者弗兰克·维尔泽克、丽莎·蓝道尔、胡安·马尔达西纳、内森·塞伯格、桑迪普·特里维迪、肖恩·卡罗尔和拉杰什·戈帕库马尔等著名物理学家都给予了高度评价。他们称赞唐清晰、引人入胜的写作风格，他传达技术细节和基本原理的能力，以及这些书对本科生和研究生课程的全面覆盖。一些评论员将这些书与经典的朗道和栗弗席兹系列相提并论，认为唐的书籍可能同样具有影响力，对物理学家来说必不可少。评论强调了这些书提供指导、洞察力、乐趣以及揭示物理概念之间相互联系的能力。

title: The effect of deactivating Facebook and Instagram on users' emotional state
summary:
This NBER working paper, "The Effect of Deactivating Facebook and Instagram on Users’ Emotional State," investigates the impact of social media deactivation on emotional well-being. The study, conducted through two large randomized experiments before the 2020 U.S. election, found that deactivating Facebook for six weeks led to a 0.060 standard deviation improvement in an index measuring happiness, depression, and anxiety compared to a control group who deactivated for only one week. Similarly, deactivating Instagram for six weeks resulted in a 0.041 standard deviation improvement.

Exploratory analysis suggests that the positive effect of Facebook deactivation was more pronounced among individuals over 35, while the positive effect of Instagram deactivation was primarily observed in women under 25.

Notably, the paper includes extensive acknowledgements and disclosures, revealing that many of the authors have ties to Meta (Facebook's parent company) through past employment, consulting work, research funding, honoraria, event attendance, or stock ownership. This raises potential conflict-of-interest considerations regarding the study's findings.
chinese_title: 停用脸书和照片墙对用户情绪状态的影响
chinese_summary:
停用Facebook和Instagram对用户情绪状态的影响
NBER工作论文《停用Facebook和Instagram对用户情绪状态的影响》研究了社交媒体停用对情绪健康的影响。该研究通过2020年美国大选前的两项大型随机实验进行，发现停用Facebook六周会导致衡量幸福感、抑郁和焦虑的指标比仅停用一周的对照组提高0.060个标准差。同样，停用Instagram六周导致该指标提高0.041个标准差。

探索性分析表明，Facebook停用的积极影响在35岁以上的人群中更为明显，而Instagram停用的积极影响主要在25岁以下的女性中观察到。

值得注意的是，该论文包含了大量的致谢和披露信息，表明许多作者通过以往的雇佣关系、咨询工作、研究经费、酬金、参加活动或股票所有权与Meta（Facebook的母公司）有关联。这引发了关于研究结果潜在的利益冲突考量。

title: Show HN: Durable Python Workflows
summary:
AutoKitteh is a developer platform for workflow automation and orchestration, offering a code-based alternative to no/low-code solutions. Built upon Temporal, it simplifies durable workflow execution in Python, Starlark, and soon JavaScript, abstracting away much of the underlying infrastructure complexity. It can be self-hosted or used as a managed cloud iPaaS (currently in beta).

Key features include a scalable "serverless" platform, an API-first architecture (gRPC/HTTP), and built-in integrations with services like Slack, GitHub, Twilio, ChatGPT, Gemini, and Gmail.

AutoKitteh handles the complexities of building reliable and scalable workflows, enabling developers to focus on business logic. It offers features such as secure API integrations, user-friendly management and debugging, automated recovery without state loss, built-in durability, and readiness for large-scale deployments.

The platform provides a CLI, a VS Code extension, and a web UI for managing workflows. Getting started is outlined in a quickstart guide, which covers installation, server setup, project creation, and a resilience demo.

The open-source AutoKitteh server is designed for self-hosted environments. To learn more about the cloud iPaaS beta, users can contact meow@autokitteh.com. Build instructions and requirements are detailed in the document.

title: Verus: Verified Rust for low-level systems code
summary:
Verus is a tool that enables developers to verify the correctness of Rust code by writing specifications, which Verus then statically checks using powerful solvers. This ensures that the code will always satisfy the specifications without needing runtime checks. Although Verus supports a subset of Rust, it expands verification capabilities, especially for low-level systems code involving raw pointers.

Currently under active development, Verus may have broken or missing features, and its documentation is incomplete. Users are encouraged to seek assistance on the Zulip channel. Despite its ongoing development, Verus has been utilized in various industry and academic projects, with research papers published about it.

To get started, users can try Verus in their browser via the Verus Playground or install it for more complex development. The documentation includes a tutorial, API documentation, and a guide for verifying concurrent code. Resources like publications, projects, tutorial materials, and examples are available to showcase Verus in action.

Contributions to Verus are welcomed, and users can report issues or start discussions on GitHub or join the Zulip channel for real-time assistance. Verus uses GitHub discussions for feature requests and GitHub issues for actionable bugs. The project is grateful to Zulip for sponsoring free hosting and to Johanna Polzin for her contribution to the design of the Verus Logo.

title: IAM Role Trust Policies: Misconfigurations Hiding in Plain Sight
summary:
This blog post highlights the often overlooked and easily misconfigured nature of IAM role trust policies in AWS, arguing they are a significant source of privilege escalation risks. The author points out the lack of clear and comprehensive documentation on trust policies as a contributing factor to these misconfigurations. The post identifies two common and dangerous mistakes:

1.  **Trusting all principals within the role's account:** Using `arn:aws:iam::<account_id>:root` in a trust policy effectively grants *any* IAM principal within that account (users, roles, Lambda functions, etc.) the ability to assume the role, bypassing the intention of restricting access. This creates an easy privilege escalation path if an attacker gains access to any identity in the account with `sts:AssumeRole` permissions.

2.  **Assuming an AND relationship between multiple principals:** When combining different principal types (e.g., an AWS account and a service principal) within the same "Principal" section, AWS evaluates them as a logical OR, not AND. This means that *either* principal can assume the role independently. For example, mistakenly believing a trust policy allows only EC2 instances from a specific account to assume a role, when it actually allows *any* EC2 instance in the local account *or* any principal in the specified account to assume it.

The article emphasizes that these subtle mistakes can have severe security implications and advocates for a better understanding of trust policy nuances to properly secure IAM roles. The author promises a subsequent post focusing on common mistakes in cross-account trust relationships.
chinese_title: IAM角色信任策略：明目张胆的错误配置
chinese_summary:
这篇博文强调了AWS中IAM角色信任策略经常被忽视且容易配置错误的特性，认为它们是权限提升风险的重要来源。作者指出，缺乏关于信任策略的清晰和全面的文档是导致这些配置错误的一个因素。该文章指出了两个常见且危险的错误：

1.  **信任角色账户内的所有主体：** 在信任策略中使用`arn:aws:iam::<account_id>:root`实际上授予了该账户内的 *任何* IAM主体（用户、角色、Lambda函数等）承担该角色的能力，绕过了限制访问的意图。如果攻击者获得账户中任何具有`sts:AssumeRole`权限的身份的访问权限，这将创建一个简单的权限提升路径。

2.  **假定多个主体之间是AND关系：** 当在同一“Principal”部分中组合不同的主体类型（例如，AWS账户和某个服务主体）时，AWS会将它们评估为逻辑OR，而不是AND。这意味着 *任何一个* 主体都可以独立承担该角色。例如，错误地认为信任策略仅允许特定账户中的EC2实例承担角色，而实际上它允许本地账户中的 *任何* EC2实例 *或* 指定账户中的 *任何* 主体承担该角色。

该文章强调，这些细微的错误可能会产生严重的安全性影响，并倡导更好地理解信任策略的细微差别，以正确保护IAM角色。作者承诺后续文章将重点关注跨账户信任关系中的常见错误。

title: How long does it take to create a new habit? (2015)
summary:
This 2015 article addresses the popular myth that it takes 21 days to form a new habit, debunking it by referencing research published in the European Journal of Social Psychology. While the 21-day idea originated from Dr. Maxwell Maltz's observations, it wasn't research-based, and the statement was often simplified.

The study by Lally et al. ("How habits are formed") followed 96 people for 12 weeks, revealing that habit formation is a longer process, ranging from 2 to 8 months, with an average of 66 days. The duration depends on the habit, the individual, and their circumstances.

Importantly, the study found that missing an opportunity to perform the new behavior doesn't significantly hinder the habit formation process.

The author argues against adhering to strict timelines like the 21-day rule or even the 66-day average. They emphasize that individual experiences vary, and dedication to the desired change is the most critical factor. The author advises focusing on the "why" behind the habit change, believing that personal commitment and control over one's behavior are more important than adhering to a specific timeframe. Ultimately, creating new habits should be driven by individual motivation rather than arbitrary deadlines.
chinese_title: 养成一个新习惯需要多久？(2015)
chinese_summary:
本文（2015年）驳斥了广为流传的“养成一个新习惯需要21天”这一说法，并引用了发表在《欧洲社会心理学杂志》上的研究成果来证明其谬误。尽管“21天”的说法源于马克斯韦尔·马尔茨医生的观察，但它并非基于研究，且该说法常常被简化。

Lally等人发表的“习惯是如何形成的”的研究对96人进行了12周的跟踪，结果表明习惯的形成是一个更长的过程，从2个月到8个月不等，平均为66天。持续时间取决于习惯、个人及其所处环境。

重要的是，该研究发现，错过一次执行新行为的机会并不会显著阻碍习惯的形成过程。

作者反对固守像“21天规则”甚至“66天平均时间”这样的严格时间表。他们强调，个人经历各不相同，而对渴望改变的投入才是最重要的因素。作者建议关注习惯改变背后的“原因”，认为个人承诺和对自身行为的控制比坚持特定时间框架更重要。最终，培养新习惯应该由个人动机驱动，而不是任意设定的截止日期。

title: Commission Finds Apple and Meta in Breach of the Digital Markets Act
summary:
The European Commission has preliminarily found that Apple and Meta are in breach of the Digital Markets Act (DMA), a landmark EU law aimed at curbing the market power of tech giants. While the exact details are still emerging and further investigation is required, the initial findings suggest that Apple and Meta have failed to adequately comply with the DMA's requirements.

The DMA focuses on preventing "gatekeepers" (dominant online platforms) from engaging in anti-competitive practices. The specific violations alleged against Apple and Meta likely pertain to these core principles. For example, Apple may be found to be restricting app developers' ability to communicate freely with their users and offer alternative payment options outside of the App Store. Meta's potential violations may involve unfair data usage practices or restrictions on interoperability with competing social media platforms.

If the Commission ultimately concludes that Apple and Meta have breached the DMA, they could face significant financial penalties, including fines of up to 10% of their global annual turnover. More importantly, they could be forced to make substantial changes to their business practices to ensure fair competition and user choice within the digital market. The investigations are ongoing, and both companies have the opportunity to respond to the Commission's preliminary findings and argue their case. This represents a significant step in the EU's efforts to regulate Big Tech and promote a more competitive digital landscape.
chinese_title: 委员会认定苹果和Meta违反《数字市场法》
chinese_summary:
欧盟委员会初步认定苹果和Meta违反了《数字市场法案》(DMA)，这是一项旨在遏制科技巨头市场力量的欧盟里程碑式法律。尽管具体细节仍在浮出水面，仍需进一步调查，但初步调查结果表明，苹果和Meta未能充分遵守DMA的要求。

DMA的重点是防止“看门人”（占主导地位的在线平台）从事反竞争行为。对苹果和Meta提出的具体违规指控可能与这些核心原则有关。例如，苹果可能被认定为限制应用程序开发者与用户自由沟通以及在App Store之外提供替代支付选项的能力。Meta的潜在违规行为可能涉及不公平的数据使用行为或限制与竞争性社交媒体平台的互操作性。

如果欧盟委员会最终认定苹果和Meta违反了DMA，它们可能面临巨额罚款，包括高达其全球年度营业额10%的罚款。更重要的是，它们可能被迫对其商业行为进行重大调整，以确保数字市场中的公平竞争和用户选择。调查仍在进行中，两家公司都有机会回应欧盟委员会的初步调查结果并为其辩护。这代表了欧盟监管大型科技公司并促进更具竞争力的数字环境方面迈出的重要一步。

title: The many ways tarrifs will hit electronics
summary:
This article, "The Many Ways Tariffs Will Hit Your Electronics," features an interview with IPC chief economist Shawn DuBravac about the impact of tariffs on the consumer electronics industry. Published in IEEE Spectrum on April 16, 2025, the interview anticipates discussing the multifaceted ways tariffs will affect the production and pricing of electronics.

While the article preview doesn't provide specific details on the ways tariffs will impact electronics, it signals that the interview will likely explore:

*   **Increased costs:** Tariffs, as taxes on imported goods, directly increase the cost of components and finished products.
*   **Supply chain disruptions:** Tariffs can disrupt established supply chains, forcing companies to seek alternative sources or relocate production.
*   **Impact on consumers:** Increased costs will likely be passed on to consumers in the form of higher prices for electronic devices.
*   **Competitive landscape:** Tariffs can shift the competitive landscape, potentially favoring domestic producers or companies located in countries not subject to the tariffs.
*   **Economic consequences:** Broader economic consequences, such as reduced trade and investment, could also be discussed.

The interview aims to provide insights into how tariffs will reshape the electronics industry.
chinese_title: 关税冲击电子产品的多重方式
chinese_summary:
关税冲击电子产品的多种方式：专访IPC首席经济学家肖恩·杜布拉瓦克

本文《关税冲击电子产品的多种方式》刊登于IEEE Spectrum，2025年4月16日。文章专访了IPC首席经济学家肖恩·杜布拉瓦克，探讨关税对消费电子行业的影响。专访预计将讨论关税影响电子产品生产和定价的多个方面。

虽然文章预览未提供关税影响电子产品的具体细节，但预示着访谈可能探讨以下内容：

*   **成本增加：** 关税作为对进口商品的税收，直接增加了零部件和成品的价格。
*   **供应链中断：** 关税会扰乱既定的供应链，迫使公司寻找替代来源或迁移生产。
*   **对消费者的影响：** 成本增加可能会以电子设备价格上涨的形式转嫁给消费者。

本次专访旨在深入了解关税将如何重塑电子行业。

title: The Truth about Atlantis (2019)
summary:
This article debunks the popular belief in the existence of Atlantis, citing a significant percentage of Americans who believe in the lost civilization. It argues that Atlantis is pure fiction, originating from Plato's dialogues, specifically "Timaios" and "Kritias."

The article explains that Plato introduces the story of Atlantis through the character of Kritias, who claims to have heard it from Solon, who in turn heard it from Egyptian priests. The story describes Atlantis as a powerful island nation that attacked Europe and Asia before being destroyed by earthquakes and floods.

The author refutes the idea that Plato wouldn't invent such a story, highlighting his penchant for using fictional narratives to illustrate philosophical points, referencing examples from "Republic" and "Symposium." They argue that the story of Atlantis shares thematic similarities with other fictional tales attributed to Plato, such as its setting in extremely ancient times.

Furthermore, the author challenges the credibility of Plato's alleged sources. The character Kritias, a member of the Thirty Tyrants, a brutal oligarchic regime, narrates the story, which raises questions about its historical accuracy. The narrative context of the dialogues is also likely fictional. The author concludes that the belief in Atlantis persists due to its romantic appeal, despite being demonstrably a product of Plato's imagination.
chinese_title: 亚特兰蒂斯真相 (2019)
chinese_summary:
本文旨在驳斥关于亚特兰蒂斯存在的普遍说法，指出相当比例的美国人相信这个失落的文明。文章论证亚特兰蒂斯纯属虚构，起源于柏拉图的对话录，特别是《蒂迈欧篇》和《克里提亚斯篇》。

文章解释说，柏拉图通过克里提亚斯这个人物引入了亚特兰蒂斯的故事，克里提亚斯声称是从梭伦那里听说的，而梭伦又是从埃及祭司那里听说的。这个故事将亚特兰蒂斯描述为一个强大的岛国，它曾袭击欧洲和亚洲，最终被地震和洪水摧毁。

作者驳斥了柏拉图不会编造这种故事的观点，强调他倾向于使用虚构叙事来阐明哲学观点，并引用了《理想国》和《会饮篇》中的例子。他们认为，亚特兰蒂斯的故事与其他归因于柏拉图的虚构故事有着主题上的相似之处，例如都设定在极其古老的时代。

此外，作者质疑柏拉图所谓的信息来源的可信度。故事由三十僭主之一，一个残酷的寡头政权的成员克里提亚斯叙述，这引发了对其历史准确性的质疑。对话录的叙事背景也可能是虚构的。作者的结论是，对亚特兰蒂斯的信仰之所以持续存在，是因为它具有浪漫的吸引力，尽管它显然是柏拉图想象力的产物。

title: Attacking My Landlord's Boiler
summary:
This blog post details the author's project to remotely control their landlord's boiler to overcome the limitations of the existing thermostat. Frustrated by uneven heating and lack of automation, the author bypassed the need for landlord approval and an electrician by exploiting the existing radio communication between the thermostat and boiler.

Initially, the author researched the thermostat's model, discovering it communicated in the 868MHz range. After unsuccessful attempts to reverse-engineer the protocol using cheaper microcontrollers, they opted for a "replay attack," recording and rebroadcasting the thermostat's signals to control the boiler directly.

They used an RTL-SDR to visualize the radio packets and a HackRF One (a clone purchased inexpensively) to transmit the recorded "on" and "off" signals. By recording the signals sent by the thermostat, they were able to "yell back" commands using the HackRF and turn the boiler on and off.

The author then integrated the HackRF with their Home Assistant server by creating a simple web server and using `curl` commands to send the recorded signals. This allowed them to automate the heating based on factors like room temperature, sleep schedule, and location.

Despite considering the HackRF overkill for a simple on/off switch, the author prioritized functionality and reliability. They are now able to remotely and automatically control their apartment's heating. Finally, the blog explains the UK's Online Safety Act and the author's decision to remove the comment section to avoid potentially ruinous fines.
chinese_title: 攻击我房东的锅炉

最初，作者研究了温控器的型号，发现它在 868MHz 范围内通信。在使用更便宜的微控制器逆向工程协议失败后，他们选择了“重放攻击”，记录并重新广播温控器的信号以直接控制锅炉。

他们使用 RTL-SDR 可视化无线电数据包，并使用 HackRF One（一款廉价购买的克隆产品）来传输记录的“开启”和“关闭”信号。通过记录温控器发送的信号，他们能够使用 HackRF“喊回去”命令，并打开和关闭锅炉。

然后，作者通过创建一个简单的 Web 服务器并使用 `curl` 命令发送记录的信号，将 HackRF 与他们的 Home Assistant 服务器集成。这使得他们能够根据房间温度、睡眠时间表和位置等因素自动控制供暖。

尽管作者认为 HackRF 对于一个简单的开关来说过于强大，但他们优先考虑了功能和可靠性。他们现在能够远程和自动控制他们公寓的供暖。最后，该博客解释了英国的《在线安全法案》以及作者决定删除评论区以避免潜在的灾难性罚款。

title: Show HN: Dosidicus – A digital pet with a simple neural network
summary:
Dosidicus is a digital pet "Tamagotchi" that incorporates a simple neural network, allowing it to learn and adapt its behavior. This research project, available on GitHub, focuses on visualizing and understanding neural networks and Hebbian learning. The squid autonomously makes decisions based on its needs (hunger, sleepiness, etc.), using a simulated vision cone to find food.

The neural network at its core allows the squid to form associations, and its weights are adjusted through Hebbian learning. Experiences stored in short-term and long-term memory also play a role in decision-making. Interestingly, Dosidicus can even generate new neurons (neurogenesis) in response to its environment.

The project includes a comprehensive needs management system, tracking factors like hunger, sleepiness, happiness, and cleanliness, which impact the squid's health. Neglecting these needs can lead to sickness and death. Additionally, Dosidicus features seven personality types that influence its behavior and allows users to customize the environment with decorations. Debug tools are available to directly view and edit the squid's internal states.

title: 101 BASIC Computer Games
summary:
This document describes a collection of BASIC computer game programs from the 1975 book "101 BASIC Computer Games" by David Ahl, published by Digital Equipment Corp. It's important to note that this collection is *different* from the more famous "BASIC Computer Games" (BCG) book also by Ahl, with several unique games.

The document highlights the diversity of BASIC dialects used in the book. The code spans incompatible versions, including Dartmouth BASIC, HP BASIC, BASIC-PLUS, and EduSystem BASIC. Identifying the correct dialect for each game is a challenge as it's often not specified.

The collection serves as a valuable example of early BASIC programming styles, showcasing differences in syntax, statement separation, and shorthand commands. The programs were converted using OCR and AI tools, with relatively few errors due to the good print quality of the original book.

A main motivation for creating this collection is to provide sample code for improving RetroBASIC, aiming to allow these programs to run correctly without modification.

The document provides a detailed listing of the games, including their name, description, page number in the book, and the likely BASIC dialect used. The games cover a wide range of genres, from strategy games like NIM and CHECKR to simulations like HMRABI and STOCK, to simple arcade games like SLOTS and GUNNER. The variety underscores the resourcefulness of early computer game developers.
